mapper.select: select sid, name, class_name, major, department, counsellor, sex, tel, email, origin, status, nation, dormitory, bedroom, bed, admission_date, birth, background from student as s inner join( select cid, class.name as class_name, major.name as major, department.name as department, `user`.username as counsellor from class inner join major on class.major_id = major.mid inner join department on major.department_id = department.did inner join `user` on class.counsellor_id = `user`.uid ) cmdu on s.class_id = cmdu.cid ${ew.customSqlSegment}
